Name: Baggy Chef Pants

This style’s baggy cut with elastic waist and drawstring closure is specially tailored to offer greater comfort and style. It features two back pockets and two side pockets for added convenience. Choose from a range of attractive colours and patterns that will complement any kitchen theme. 65/35 Poly/Cotton 7.25-oz. Twill Fabric

Name: 100% Cotton Work Shirts
Description:
The incomparable feel of this 100% Cotton Work Shirt is designed to fit comfortably under any coat or coverall. This highly efficient design also features two convenient chest pockets, full button front, and snap closure at the neck. 100% Cotton 5.5-oz. Twill Fabric

Description:
A classic shirt featuring full button front, it is the perfect service wear solution for a wide range of industries, work settings, and duties. Made with comfortable yet durable poly/cotton blend fabric, it features two chest pockets with matching button closures. 65/35 Poly/Cotton 4.5-oz. Poplin Fabric

Description:
Perfect for a wide range of industries and work conditions. The wide variety of colour options ensures a match for virtually every workplace. Lightweight and substantial feel are bolstered with lined collar and cuffs, including two buttoned-closed chest pockets and an optional short sleeve design. 65/35 Poly/Cotton 4.5-oz. Poplin Fabric

Name: Cargo Chef Pants
Description:

Name: Spun Polyester Counter Coats
Description:
When more durability is needed, our Spun Polyester Counter Coat is the ideal solution. The heavyweight twill fabric gives this coat its sharp appearance, while the strong dome closures add security. This coat is also available with optional knitted cuffs. 100% Spun Polyester 7.1-oz. Twill Fabric

Poplin Fabric

Name: 100% Cotton Bib-Overalls With 2″ Reflective Tape
Description:
Essential work wear in any number of challenging environments. The bright 3M fluorescent two-tone reflective stripes offers safety benefits that everyone can clearly see. The bib design allows for more freedom of movement on the job without sacrificing visibility. It also features a full zippered front with adjustable shoulder straps, plus chest, front, and back pockets, with side openings for quick access to interior pockets. 100% Cotton 8.5-oz. Twill Fabric
